reviewText: Hallmark movies a favorite of my tastes. I don't have television, cable or dish. So this is one way to enjoy in the evenings.
summary: Hallmark DVD's allows good stories and I do not have cable.
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)

reviewText: OF ALL 4 MOVIES I REALLY LIKE TRADING CHRISTMAS WITH FAITH FORD IN IT AND WHATSECRETS CAN MESS UP.  BUT THESE SECRETS TURN OUT FOR THE BEST AND ARE FUNNY,UNPREDICTABLE, AND JUST UNBELIEVABLE IN THEIR WRITING.  REALLY LIKE IT.THE NATIONAL TREE SHOWS THE LOVE OF A FATHER AND SON THROUGH TRYING TIMES,AND BEING ABLE TO SHOW FORGIVENESS FOR UNEXPECTED THINGS.THE CASE FOR CHRISTMAS JUST GIVES YOU EVEN MORE EVIDENCE THAT THEIR TRULY ISA SANTA CLAUS, IF ONLY IN YOUR HEART.LUCKY CHRISTMAS IS HAVING ENOUGH FAITH IN ANOTHER PERSON TO TELL THE TRUTH/
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)

reviewText: Liked the films enjoyed them very much  would very much look forward to the next lot of dvd,s to come out
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)

reviewText: You can't get any better than Hallmark. So when I dropped cable I started collecting hallmark movies. They are all family friendly, no commercials this is the best part. a story is always better when it is told all the way through.
summary: All of these are a must for my collection
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)

reviewText: We havent viewed this Christmas Movie Collection yet, since the Holiday season is a two months away.But we like Hallmark movies and usually they are movies the whole family can watch together.  The seller was prompt in sending this cd, but until we view the Holiday collection I can only rate the seller!
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)

reviewText: Hallmark always has the cutest Christmas movies.  Since I don't get the Hallmark channel anymore, this was a great way to see what I was missing.
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)

reviewText: You have romance, single parents working hard to have Christmas for their young children, and a father and son hauling a Christmas tree to Washington.  A wonderful variety of Christmas movies for everyone in your house.  Get out the snacks and enjoy!  Oh, my favorite is the National Tree.  PS  If you have family and friends who don't have the Hallmark channel you have a great gift when you share these movies.  Enjoy the holidays.
summary: Awesome selection of Christmas movies sure to be a hit at your home this Christmas.
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)

reviewText: The movies are enjoyable and I love to watch Christmas movies anytime of the year!! This is my favorite time!!
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)

reviewText: These movies were all excellent stories with wonderful actors. They are made for family viewing since the content is very innocent. But they also are interesting all the way through. I like the fact they are four in one package, one price.
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)

reviewText: I ordered this collection to watch over the Christmas holidays, but there were so many good Christmas Hallmark movies on TV, I never got around to opening this.  I am giving it 5 stars anyway because I'm sure these will be in the same caliber as all the other Hallmark movies.  Think I will wait until summer to watch them and have Christmas in July.
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)

reviewText: This collection was a fair price for the 4 movies.  One movie was just fair, another was shown on television this Christmas season, and the other 2 were pretty good movies.
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)

reviewText: I love it when they make "collections" so I can get more value for my hard earned money.  I've watched two so far and will watch the others soon.
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)

reviewText: These movies are good; I enjoy watching Christmas movies all year round and having the DVD is convenient.  These are the usual sappy Christmas movies that make you feel good.
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)

reviewText: I thoroughly enjoyed these Christmas themed movies; I am never disappointed with Hallmark.  although "Lucky Christmas" cam really close to disappointment - but the other 3 movies are well worth purchasing.
summary: Three out of Four are Excellent
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)

reviewText: I love Hallmark movies and this is a great selection to have, really Love Christmas stories and this is a good one.
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)

reviewText: Very beautiful, scenic, and homey Christmas stories for the whole family.  The only problem I had was one of the discs would not open up to the second movie.  Tried a few times but I had no success and gave up.  I will try it again some time.
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)

reviewText: I am a sucker for good Christmas movies.  They get me in the mood for the holidays.  Hallmark always has great entertainment!!
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)

reviewText: I love watching Hallmark, especially at the holiday time when they show all of their Christmas Movies.  I usually try to purchase one each year and The National Tree is one of my favorite Movies.
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)

reviewText: We love Christmas movies and getting four in one package is a real treat.  They were all pretty good, but not the fabulous movies that come out every year.  I think they were probably all the ABC Family movies which are usually good movies.  The National Tree was a little slow but a good movie.  None of these movies were "Wow!" movies but great for an evening of popcorn and just family.
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)

reviewText: I really like this movie set. It comes in 2 DVDs and ALL the movies are good. I was glad I got this for Christmas. All are good, clean,  romantic comedies.
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)

reviewText: Glad I added to my Christmas collection. Will be watching them again in December.
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)

reviewText: I WOULD RECOMMEND THESE MOVIE THAT ENJOYS CHRISTMAS MOVIES OR FAMILY TYPE MOVIES. THEY BRING BACK OLD FASHION TYPE CHRISTMAS MEMORIES FOR FAMILIES NOW AND IN THE FUTURE.
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)

reviewText: I enjoyed all 4 of these movies.  My favorite is the Lucky Christmas, but all 4 movies are enjoyable.  I highly recommend.
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)

reviewText: I really enjoy these schmalzy stories!  This Case is sort a version of the old Natalie wood film, but set in today.  I liked it-It was entertaining and fun! The national Tree also plays well. All for are exactly as expected.  Light, entertaining kind of like Hallmark. Nothing intellectual, but I enjoyed them! Watched them with my Golden Retrievers, they liked them!
summary: Christmas entertainment! Fun for the family and the stories are fairly good.
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)

reviewText: This is not the best set of Christmas movies I have watched, but ok. Good for family viewing during the holidays.
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)

reviewText: Loved 3 out of the 4 movies and well worth the purchase price!  The movie Lucky is one of the most fun and best Christmas movies I have seen!  You will love it!
summary: Great Bargain on these 4 Christmas movies!
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)

reviewText: I have not been able to look at all of these Christmas movies but the ones I have are very entertaining and puts you in the spirit of Christmas.  I would highly recommend this product to anyone.  Great price for 4 movies.
Title: Hallmark Holiday Collection: Movie 4 Pack (Trading Christmas, Lucky Christmas, Case For Christmas, National Tree)
